title: Harry Styles discography
summary: As a solo artist, English singer Harry Styles has released two studio albums, one extended play (EP), one video album, ten singles, eight music videos and one promotional single. Styles's music career began in 2010 as a member of the boy band One Direction.[1][2] Following the group's indefinite hiatus in 2016,[3] he signed a recording contract with Columbia Records as a solo artist the same year.[4][5] In April 2017, Styles released his debut single "Sign of the Times".[6] It reached number one on the UK Singles Chart and number four on the US Billboard Hot 100, while also topping the singles chart in Australia; it was certified triple platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA), and quadruple platinum by the Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA).
